ComicInfo.Title: Life, Death, and the Living Force; Mara Jade: A Night on the Town; Extinction, Part 1 of 2; Skippy the Jedi Droid
ComicInfo.Summary:
Life, Death, and the Living Force: Obi-Wan Kenobi learns a lesson about serving the living force.
Mara Jade: A Night on the Town: Mara Jade meets Rebel General Crix Madine.
Extinction, Part 1 of 2: A retired Jedi ignites her lightsaber one last time for a battle with Darth Vader.
Skippy the Jedi Droid: Skippy the Jedi Droid sacrifices himself so that R2-D2 can fulfill his destiny with Luke Skywalker.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-31 21:33:36. [CVDB97444] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:41:04. [Issue ID 214986]
